apps.name: HD Flix (No Ads)
apps.subtitle: The All-In-One Movie app for iOS
apps.localizedDescription:
WHEN YOU FIRST OPEN THE APP IT WILL LOOK LIKE A DIFFERENT APP JUST WAIT AND IT WILL CHANGE TO THE MOVIE APP

With HD Flix for iOS you can able to watch any movie/tv show. The User Interface that you see in the app is truly the best thing about it. Easy navigation and responsive design made it stand at the top of the list.

It will display all the trending content from Action, Comedy, Sci-Fi and other genres at the home page for the best user experience. Moreover, you will get to read the complete information about any particular movie including IMDB Rating, Year Of Release, Start Cast, etc.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses the camera for capturing photos or videos.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: App uses location when on app.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: App uses the microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App accesses the user's photo library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: App tracks user activity for advertising purposes.

apps.name: YTLite
apps.subtitle: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options.
apps.versionDescription: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options. Features: Download videos, audio (including audio track selection), thumbnails, posts, and profile pictures. Copy video, comment, and post information. Interface customization: Remove feed elements, reorder tabs, enable OLED mode, and as use Shorts-only mode. Player settings: Gestures, default quality, preferred audio track. Save, Load and Restore settings. Clear cache once or automatically on app startup. Built-in SponsorBlock. And much, much more.
apps.localizedDescription: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options.
